title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 116.2 - Application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 116.2 - Application

State Regulations

Each letter application should include a statement of the
reasons for such application and should be accompanied by a certified copy of
the resolution of the applicant's board of directors authorizing such
application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
116.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
